Remap ptr addrspace(7) to &#123;ptr addrspace(8), i32&#125; (the resource and offset parts of the pointer) so that we can easily rewrite operations on these values that aren&#39;t loading them from or storing them to memory. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtostructtypemap/#details">More...</a>

Recursively replace instances of ptr addrspace(7) and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; with some other type as defined by the relevant subclass. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtypeloweringbase/#details">More...</a>
